item.title: About
item.description: ICSteve is try to achieve the following goals: Build IC knowledge graph Spread the ICCAD Welcome to follow me at 知乎专栏 （ICCAD） 知识星球 （ICSteve） 微信公众号 （IC物理设计）
This post share how I setup a git repository to host my note structure with the following tools. Hugo for website Obsidian for note taking docsify

author: “Steve” title: “What is best for IPC or RPC? I tell, you choose” date: “2022-01-16” description: “The course actually help me to understand how to deal with communication with others.” tags : [ “PM”, “Learning” ] categories : [“THOUGHT”] First question I want to go throug is: What is IPC and RPC, and why it is important in Hardward design flow? IPC or Inter-Process Communication which refers specifically to the mechanisms an operating system provides to allow the processes to manage shared data.

author : “Steve” title : “Volunteer day at AAH (2022/07/02)” date : “2021-07-02” description : “Plan RUI - tree command” tags : [“volunteer”, “aah”] categories : [“life”] Volunteer day at AAH (2022/07/02) Today is my 2nd time volunteer experience at AAH (https://www.animalassistedhappiness.org/). Other than school volunteer, I have less experience on other organizations. AAH is providing the oportunities with the animals. I like close to the animals. Clean the Horse House from
